name: Grip Games Anthology
description:
8 games in a bundle: Jet Car Stunts + Atomic Ninjas + Foosball 2012 + The Impossible Game + One Epic Game + MiniSquadron + Blimp + 5-in-1 Arcade Hits.

Jet Car Stunts:
Drive a Jet Car, a hybrid between a race car and a jet, and race your way through the most devious tracks full of jumps, loops, free falls, and sharp turns. Use your jet engine to perform mile-long jumps, find shortcuts and new paths, and challenge the best racers around the world!

Atomic Ninjas:
Outsmart and outflank other players, upgrade your Super Abilities and use crazy ninja weapons and gadgets. Only the most malicious players win!

Foosball 2012:
Play multiplayer matches, dominate the online leaderboards, or become a global champion in the single-player World Tour mode.

+ 5 minis games

Jet Car Stunts

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
5MB minimum space required
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080i 1080p

Atomic Ninjas

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
5MB minimum space required
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080i 1080p
Network Players: 2 - 4

Foosball 2012

Compatible with PlayStation®3.
5MB minimum space required
1 Player
DUALSHOCK®3 Vibration Function
HDTV screen resolution: 720p 1080i 1080p
Network Players: 2 - 2

The Impossible Game, One Epic Game, Minisquadron, Blimp: The Flying Adventures, 5-in-1 Arcade Hits:

Compatible with PlayStation®3, PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) and PlayStation®Vita.
1MB minimum space required
1 Player
This product supports the following languages: In-game speech: English On-screen text: English.
